block.p: Laura Cook Whipple, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Whipple III of Meadowbrook, Pa., was married yesterday to Kristian Michael Whalen, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Terrence M. Whalen of Mississauga, Ontario. The Rev. Dr. Raymond Roberts performed the ceremony at Grace Presbyterian Church in Jenkintown, Pa.
The bride, 25, and bridegroom, 26, graduated from Brown University, where they met.

Laura Cook Whipple, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charles J. Whipple III of Meadowbrook, Pa., was married yesterday to Kristian Michael Whalen, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Terrence M. Whalen of Mississauga, Ontario. The Rev. Dr. Raymond Roberts performed the ceremony at Grace Presbyterian Church in Jenkintown, Pa.
The bride, 25, and bridegroom, 26, graduated from Brown University, where they met.

Mrs. Whalen is a senior associate, recruiting executives for the financial industry, at Korn/Ferry International, the search organization in New York. Her father owns Whipple & Associates, an insurance and financial planning agency in Horsham, Pa., and her mother, Lynne Whipple, is the agency's director of marketing.

Until last week, Mr. Whalen was an associate at Vestar Capital Partners in New York. He is to begin studying next month at Harvard Business School for an M.B.A. degree. His mother, Catherine Whalen, teaches kindergarten at Bishop Scalabrini Elementary School in Mississauga. His father is an investment banker and managing director in Toronto with the real estate group of TD Securities, a subsidiary of the Toronto Dominion Bank.
